description:
FlavorExtraSpecs extension lacks API Samples tests.

Please take a look into the related blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get to know the actions to fix this bug.
title: FlavorExtraSpecs extension doesn't have API Sample to documentation

comments.content:
FlavorExtraSpecs extension lacks API Samples tests.

Please take a look into the related blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get to know the actions to fix this bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lauria

comments.content: Do not set to Fixreleased until it's in a release.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
